description.narrative: The project development objectives are to improve the management of the education system, teaching practices, and learning conditions.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Basic and Senior Secondary Educaiton

description.narrative: Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2020
Total Disbursement in First Quarter of 2022
Total Disbursement in Second Quarter of 2021
Total Disbursement in Third Quarter of 2020
Total Disbursement in Third Quarter of 2021

condition.narrative: The FEPS shall assume not later than June 30, 2021, the fiduciary management responsibility of the Project (except for the ProjectImplementing Entity’s Respective Part of the Project) in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement and the PIM.

The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months from the Effectiveness Date establish and thereafter maintain throughoutimplementation of the Project, a Multi-Donor Trust Fund Free Education Project Steering Committee (“MDTFSC”), with a composition,mandate, terms of reference and resources satisfactory to the Association.

The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months from the Effectiveness Date, establish and thereafter maintain throughout theimplementation of the Project, the Free Education Project Secretariat (FEPS) responsible for the day-to-day management andcoordination of the Project, with adequate resources, key staff including an environmental specialist, a social developmentspecialist, and a monitoring and evaluation specialist with qualifications, skills and terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation.

title.narrative: Annual school census conducted and report produced
Number of SMC and Board of Governor members and teachers trained in gender in education (gender sensitization, GBV prevention and awareness)
Number of classrooms constructed in compliance with standards in target schools
Number of students benefiting from improved learning environment
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Number of teachers in primary and JSSs participating in cluster-based CPD
Female students in secondary education benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Share of grievances addressed within a certain time period
Students in secondary education benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Female students in primary education benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Students in primary education benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Share of PBF schools meeting 85% of teacher attendance rate
Share of PBF schools meeting 85% of student attendance rate
Number of schools developing school improvement plan and executing school activities based on the plan using a participatory approach
School quality standards developed for primary and secondary schools

target.value: New school quality standards rolled out

actual.value: Updated SQA framework needs to be developed.

title.narrative: Inclusive education policy developed and in use

target.value: Teacher training program using inclusive education policy

actual.value: Radical inclusion Policy was developed and approved by Cabinet.

title.narrative: Survey of SMCs organization and effectiveness

baseline.value: Information of SMCs operation available on REDiSL supported schools

target.value: SMC manual revised based on evaluation results

actual.value: This indicator will move in February 2021. The development of TOR for consultancy is ongoing

title.narrative: One national learning assessment (NLA) conducted and findings disseminated

baseline.value: No integrated national learning assessment (NLA) conducted

target.value: Results of NLA disseminated and used for learning improvement

actual.value: National assessment team (National Assessment Services Unit [NASU]) at MBSSE set up and staff trained.

title.narrative: School catchment area and rationalization plan in place and associated transparent criterion-based school approval, and financing process implemented

baseline.value: No school catchment area plan in place

target.value: Associated transparent criterion-based school approval and financing process implemented

actual.value: School catchment area policy developed and endorsed.

title.narrative: A system for examination analysis and feedback in place

target.value: Pedagogical feedback developed for the analysis at down to school level and provided to all approved schools

actual.value: Analysis report for exams has been published.

title.narrative: Teacher management information system developed and in use

baseline.value: Teacher management information system not in place

target.value: Teacher management information system in use

actual.value: Needs analysis conducted for teacher management information system

title.narrative: Percentage of teachers receiving project-supported training demonstrating improved teaching practices in the classroom

actual.value: A tool for the Assessment on improved teaching practice is being developed. Data collection will commence in February, 2022.

Number of schools equipped with minimum hygiene standards for prevention of COVID-19
Number of children in the relevant age-group provided access to programs and sensitization campaigns on COVID-19 and education response

Number of children in the relevant age-group provided access to programs and sensitization campaigns on COVID-19 and education response - female
Percentage of stakeholders receiving training demonstrating improved knowledge on gender
